backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five text contrast and readability improvements across hero section, contact section, product cards, and live rates dashboard components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing enhanced text contrast, gradient overlays, and WCAG AA compliance improvements throughout the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining enhanced contrast ratios for light and dark modes with foreground colors at 10% lightness and text-on-dark at 90-100% lightness.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Silver Gold Refinery', and root div mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component composing MetalTicker, HeroSection, LiveRatesDashboard, ProductsSection, ContactSection, SocialMediaAssets, and Footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with WhatsApp integration displaying phone number 9518553890, featuring improved card background opacity (98%), enhanced text contrast with darker green shades, and refinery interior background image.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with furnace background image, enhanced gradient overlay (75-80% opacity), white text with drop-shadow utilities for maximum visibility, and premium precious metals messaging.
frontend/src/components/LiveRatesDashboa: Live rates dashboard displaying gold (per 10g) and silver (per kg) prices with GST breakdown, trend indicators, high/low values, and improved text contrast using foreground color tokens and bold font-weights.
frontend/src/components/MetalTicker.tsx: Displays a sticky top ticker showing live gold, silver, and platinum prices with animated scrolling, trend indicators, and Indian number formatting.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a card component for displaying precious metal products with image, purity levels, available formats, and color-coded badges.
Section component showcasing silver and gold products with ProductCard components and refinery process images with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaAsset: Provides a downloadable Instagram sponsorship post asset (1080x1080px) for promoting live gold and silver rates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMetalPrices.ts: React Query hook that fetches live metal prices (gold per 10g, silver per kg in INR, platinum in USD) with simulated market variations and USD-to-INR conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are needed as all data is static.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system for light and dark modes, including custom metallic theme colors (gold/silver) and a ticker scrolling animation. Includes enhanced contrast colors for better text readability across all UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom animations (accordion, collapsible, caret-blink), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing five existing features focused on improving text contrast and readability across HeroSection, ContactSection, ProductCard, and LiveRatesDashboard components.
